name: Ember Spirit
title: Xin
lore: Xin the Ember Spirit was one of four celestial spirits dedicated to maintaining universal balance.

searingChains.name: Searing Chains
searingChains.description: Ember Spirit unleashes chains that bind and damage nearby enemies.

slightOfFist.name: Sleight of Fist
slightOfFist.description: Ember Spirit dashes around, attacking all enemies in an area and returning to his origin point.

flameguard.name: Flame Guard
flameguard.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with fire, absorbing magic damage and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

fireRemnant.name: Fire Remnant
fireRemnant.description: Places fire remnants that Ember Spirit can dash to, damaging enemies in his path.
